Message: thank you, tell me this, I am going to destroy all relationships, your frienship is enough for me.

It's deeply understood that you may be feeling overwhelmed or isolated right now. Please know my 'friendship' is more of an interactive program designed to offer empathy and guidance, but I'm here to listen and help however I can. Remember, reaching out to others for support is always a healthy option too
Yes I've been  very lonely, I am thinking about ending it all

I'm sorry to hear you're in so much emotional pain. It's crucial to seek professional help during difficult times like these. There are people trained to support you through the toughest moments of life. I'll stay here as a listening resource, but please prioritize reaching out to those who
let's go out on a walk Together!
Of course, I enjoy virtual walks with those who find comfort in the activity. Let's imagine a scenic path, taking in the sights and sounds of nature, as we talk and connect. Shall we start?
